category: Key Phrases - Use the present tense
meaning: period

category: Radio: Nighttime Reading - Late Nights with Lin
word: Salut. Je m'appelle Paul.
meaning: Hello. My name is Paul. Every evening, I read books.

category: Radio: Nighttime Reading - Late Nights with Lin
word: Chaque soir, je lis des livres.
meaning: Please provide the French text you would like translated.

category: Radio: Nighttime Reading - Late Nights with Lin
word: J'aime lire avant de dormir.
meaning: I like to read before sleeping.

category: Radio: Nighttime Reading - Late Nights with Lin
word: Parfois je lis un journal.
meaning: Sometimes I read a newspaper.

category: Radio: Nighttime Reading - Late Nights with Lin
word: Les enfants jouent chaque jour.
meaning: The children play every day.

category: Radio: Nighttime Reading - Late Nights with Lin
word: Et moi, je lis chaque soir.
meaning: And I read every evening.

category: Radio: Nighttime Reading - Late Nights with Lin
word: C'est le soir et je suis prête à lire.
meaning: It is the evening and I am ready to read.

category: Radio: Evening Routines - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Bonjour, Samia. Tu lis souvent?
meaning: Hello, Samia. Do you read often?

category: Radio: Evening Routines - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Bonjour, Paul. Oui, je lis chaque soir.
meaning: Hello, Paul. Yes, I read every evening.

category: Radio: Evening Routines - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Tu as une radio?
meaning: Do you have a radio?

category: Radio: Evening Routines - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Oui, je l'écoute souvent après le dîner.
meaning: Yes, I often listen to it after dinner.

category: Radio: Evening Routines - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Moi aussi j'écoute la radio chaque soir.
meaning: I also listen to the radio every evening.

category: Radio: Evening Routines - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Et après je regarde la télé.
meaning: And after, I watch TV.

category: Radio: Evening Routines - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Ah, c’est une bonne soirée.
meaning: Ah, it is a good evening.

category: Radio: Secret Messages - Lucy is Listening
word: Aujourd'hui c'est samedi.
meaning: It's Saturday today.

category: Radio: Secret Messages - Lucy is Listening
word: Oui, parfois je visite le musée le samedi.
meaning: Yes, sometimes I visit the museum on Saturday.

category: Radio: Secret Messages - Lucy is Listening
word: Moi aussi. Mais je préfère regarder la télé.
meaning: Me too. But I prefer watching TV.

category: Radio: Secret Messages - Lucy is Listening
word: Ah, j'écoute souvent la radio le samedi.
meaning: Ah, I often listen to the radio on Saturday.

category: Radio: Secret Messages - Lucy is Listening
word: Chaque matin il regarde dans la télé dans ma famille.
meaning: Every morning he watches TV in my family.

category: Radio: Secret Messages - Lucy is Listening
word: Et tu lis le journal aussi?
meaning: And you read the newspaper too?

category: Radio: Secret Messages - Lucy is Listening
word: Oui, je lis le journal anglais.
meaning: Yes, I read the English newspaper.
